price: Ohun tí wọ́n ń fẹ́ wà nínú rẹ̀. Àlékún sì tún wà ní ọ̀dọ̀ Wa.
arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lahum mā yashāūna fīhā waladaynā mazīdun
